entry.title: FI-TV (Travel Management): S/4HANA and Enhancement Approach with PTK99
entry.content:
Hello folks,

I got a question regarding Migration Info in SAP Note 2719018 - S4TWL - SAP Travel Management in SAP S/4HANA Suite - SAP for Me .

In before: We are using FI-TV with heavily enhanced and partially modified database and business logic making usage of the Structure PTK99 which is reused in the PCL1-TE Cluster. We are solely using WebDynpro ABAP Apps for Enduser-Processes and SAPGUI Transactions which are not yet obsolete for power users. We do not use any Fiori Apps except for MTA (not MTR) rendered within the Fiori My Inbox.

My question concerns the following passage in the aforementioned note:

"(. . .)Table PTK99: The use of table PTK99 is not supported. Instead we provide an extensibility concept (please see SAP KBA 3296253 and 3260453). If you want to manage old data in the cluster corresponding to the structure PTK99, you will need to manage the mapping between the old structure (PTK99) and new structures yourself via extensibility concept.(. . .)"

This passage seems to be related only to the newly available Fiori Apps . However, at the same time, it does not explicitly state that the approach with PTK99 will still be supported for "the old stuff". Since the codeline is not changed aside from simplifications which (as far as I can tell) do not impede on this functionality, I'm 95% sure our approach should still be technically viable, but I would sleep better at night if somebody could confirm my thesis.

*Attempting to summon @FX-Vila *

Any replies are highly appreciated!

Cheers, Lukas

entry.title: how to start learning SAP - trainings, courses
entry.content:
Hi everybody, 

I’m new here and I have a question. I want to learn SAP and am new to this technology. Yes, I know it’s pretty tough with a lot to learn. But I want to do it because I want to change my profile. My background is data warehouse development, data modeling, and ETL development. Here I want to pivot instead of diving deeper into AWS or Azure cloud; I want to learn SAP, maybe SAP BTP and Cloud.

What do you think? Are these good topics for the future and with my background? Is there anyone here who can offer advice on which courses and trainings to start with for an introduction?

entry.title: Budget Availability Control
entry.content:
Good afternoon, I have configured the budget availability control profile for cost centers in SAP 4/HANA PUBLIC CLOUD. I have created a profile where I added the general ledger hierarchy that I had previously created with a group of accounts that I want to affect the budget, and then I added the tolerance limits.

While testing, I wanted to see how a different account would affect the previously created group but with the same cost center, and I noticed that it consumes the budget.

So far, so good. Having done this, I wanted to see the tolerance limit, so I ran another test with an account loaded in the group and took it to the budgeted limit, and I saw that the limit does not cover it; it only covers it when the amount posted to the other account that does not belong to the group is increased.

Here is a brief example I have made up: Account group (601, 602, 603), budget of €3,000. I post €200 to account (620) and to the same cost center as the group. In the "
Commitments by Cost Center" application, you can visually see the consumption of the remaining €2,800 of the budget. But if I post €2801 to account (601), the limit would not mark 100%, it only does so if I mark €3001. I suppose this is because the system understands that the limit is only reached with accounts that are in the same group.

- Could someone give me more detailed information?
- Why does it appear in the application if it does not belong to the account group and is taking away from my budget?
- And why do I have to count the consumption of the other account that does not belong to the group in order to reach the tolerance limit?

I would appreciate it if someone could help me.

Best regards and thanks in advance.

entry.title: preference indicator not set in VBAP and VBRP SAP S/4HANA
entry.content:
Hello all,

first time posting here, do not know if I have done everything correctly.

We encountered an issue with our preference indicator in VBAP and VBRP in SAP S/4HANA. In our coding we use SAP standard functions to determine whether preference indicator should be set or not. These standard functions (example /SAPSLL/SD0A_PREF_IND_DET) use variable gc_true and gc_false, as well as lv_active type xfeld. These variables are hard-coded to X (gc_true) or empty (gc_false).

Our issue lies in a change of the data element and domain of field PREFE in VBAP and VBRP. In our ECC environment the field PREFE has the data element PREAV which has the domain XFELD (values X and empty). Now, in our S/4 environment the same field has the data element PREFE with the domain PREFE. The domain PREFE has alphabetical values. We checked the table versions and saw that it was changed on 21.01.25 from SAP.

Are we missing something? Do we maybe need to implement a SAP Note? How can we resolve this issue?

entry.title: PO header and item text do not appear in printed form in selected languages
entry.content:
hello

our issue is the following, to which I could not find the solution;

we enter text in header and items in a PO:

I checked that the text language, supplier language, message language are the same:

For suppliers with language and  text in French, German, English the text is printed.

In other languages, such as Italian, the text is ignored and does not appear in the printout.

I tried to create a PO in Italian Logon (which should not matter) but the result is the same.

this happens in ECC as well as in S/4 hana.

where else can I check?

entry.title: Business Function Activation for scope items 4HH 4HI has not delivered configuration
entry.content:
We are currently in a live PRIVATE S/4HANA environment, and for a new project we wish to use the scope items 4HH - Reactive Maintenance and 4HI - Proactive Maintenance.

Following the information from this link Required Enterprise Business Functions | SAP Help Portal we have activated the following Business Functions in our Dev environment.

LOG_EAM_CI_8
LOG_EAM_CI_9
LOG_EAM_CI_10
LOG_EAM_CI_11
LOG_EAM_CI_12
LOG_EAM_SIMPLICITY
LOG_EAM_SIMPLICITY_2
LOG_EAM_SIMPLICITY_3
LOG_EAM_SIMPLICITY_4
LOG_EAM_SIMPLICITY_5
LOG_EAM_SIMPLICITY_6
LOG_EAM_SIMPLICITY_7
LOG_EAM_SIMPLICITY_8
LOG_EAM_SIMPLICITY_9
LOG_EAM_SIMPLICITY_10
LOG_EAM_SIMPLICITY_11
LOG_EAM_SIMPLICITY_12
LOG_EAM_IME_1

Unfortunately no configuration has been loaded as a result of this activation, although I appreciate it might be my misunderstanding of how it should work. For example Maintenance Order YA01 does not exist in the system.

Is there something we are missing here? Please can you advise us if there is anything else we need to do? We have not activated any of the "previous" business functions, so not sure whether this needs to be done although there is no dependency on the items we have activated.

Many thanks, Adrian

entry.title: Exporting Plan Data from SAC to SAP S/4HANA
entry.content:
Dear Community,

We want to export planning data from our SAC Model to S/4HANA and more specific, to ACDOCP. As we can see, there is only one export method available: Clean and Replace.

However, we do not wish to delete the existing records of ACDOCP. 

Is there any way, that we can export our data to ACDOCP without deleting any of the other records?

Thank you in advance for you help!

SAP Analytics Cloud

entry.title: In Change logs One in between CR processing another CR changes appears
entry.content:
Hi Friends,

I noticed an one issue, For the material user is trying to extend more plants and sales org in NWBC using CR process. 

In the change document i noticed in between the One CR changes another CR no is showing with some changes on the same material with different CR. How this is possible Once the Final check approved after completing the changes related to the 1st CR then only the 2nd CR needs to process and the change log should appears in the change document right?

Can any one please explain how it's possible where i need to check the reason for this issue?

Thanks and Regards,

Radhakrishnan/P

entry.title: ACC_DOCUMENT04 IDoc Error: Posting to Statistical IO with a Profitability Segment (PSG)
entry.content:
Hello SAP Community,

I'm encountering an issue while posting a G/L document using they goal is to post line items to a Profitability Segment (PSG) as the real cost object and also to a statistical Internal Order for reporting purposes.

The Internal Order is correctly configured with the "Statistical" indicator active. While the posting works perfectly when I use a Cost Center as the real object, it fails when I use a Profitability Segment. With a PSG, the system seems to incorrectly treat the statistical IO as a real object, leading to an error.

I have already tried using the field E1BPACFL09-STAT_CON = 'X' to explicitly flag the line item as statistical. However, when this is set along with the PSG data, the entire G/L line item is simply dropped from the final accounting document.

The business requirement is to use statistical orders to track project costs, while the true posting must go to CO-PA. My background is in FI, so I am still developing my CO expertise. I would be grateful for any insights on the following:

  1. Is it a standard SAP limitation that a Profitability Segment and a statistical Internal Order cannot be used together on a single line item in the ACC_DOCUMENT04 IDoc?

  2. Am I missing a specific field or configuration in the IDoc that is required for this scenario?

  3. If this approach is not possible, could you suggest an alternative for achieving a real posting to CO-PA with a simultaneous statistical posting to an Internal Order via an interface?

Thank you in advance for your help!
